document_data.name: Zhaelun's Stockyard
document_data.mainbody: '''Zhaelun's Stockyard''' was one of feedlots that kept livestock and poultry in [[Suzail]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Zhaelun's Stockyard stood on the [[Court Close]]. The feedlot could be found two city blocks south of the [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] and two blocks north of the intersection of the [[Dancing Druid Lane]] and [[Silverscales Street]].{{cite web| url = http://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Dec 2004 | accessdate = 13-04-2021| date = 13-04-2021}}
